text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hey, Rudolph? I think our current uniform is cute, but…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I think a teensy change could really bring the good vibes!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Uniforms aren't something you change on a moment's notice, but I will hear you out.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: There are these items that make you look more dignified, cool and strong just by adding them, you see.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I've heard of "shoulder pads"… It's interesting to hear how silhouette changes one's impression.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Totally! Firm shoulders are a sign of strength☆

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: With a confident silhouette, everyone will become even more nifty!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hmmm… I will bring it up at the next student council meeting.
